sentence.text: In this study, we found that negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II acted as a tumor suppressor and that its expression was downregulated in UM.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Taken together, our studies of UM reveal a critical role of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in the regulation of tumorigenesis, at least partly through its downstream target, lncRNA-numb, and provide a potential therapeutic target for UM

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
